reuze.awt

Class gb_HeightMapImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_a_HeightMap
      • reuze.awt.gb_HeightMapImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gb_i_HeightMap

    public class gb_HeightMapImage
extends gb_a_HeightMap
    ImageBasedHeightMap is a height map created from the gray-scale conversion of an image. The image used currently must have an equal height and width, although future work could scale an incoming image to a specific height and width.
    Version:
    $id$
    Author:
    Mike Kienenberger

    • Constructor Detail

      • gb_HeightMapImage

        public gb_HeightMapImage()

      • gb_HeightMapImage

        public gb_HeightMapImage(BufferedImage colorImage)
        Creates a HeightMap from an Image. The image will be converted to grayscale, and the grayscale values will be used to generate the height map. White is highest point while black is lowest point. Currently, the Image used must be square (width == height), but future work could rescale the image.
        Parameters:
        colorImage - Image to map to the height map.

      • gb_HeightMapImage

        public gb_HeightMapImage(BufferedImage colorImage,
                 float heightScale)
